no_wallet: ^Sigh - okay then Matty boy, but you owe me a drink.
Wallet: ^Well, you can go get your own snack.
coworker_interaction: ^I'm pretty good. Just the same old thing.
^But hey, how's it going with your partner? Still mad at you?
continue: ^Eh, they’ll get over it eventually. Not your fault that you just need the time to get ready, y’know?

thats_the_spirit: ^Thats the spirit. Hey, I got an idea that might cheer you up, why not get a drink after this?
^The bar’s close and you look like you need to loosen up. And you owe me a drink anyway so perfect opportunity.
awkward: ^Actually, I got an idea that might cheer you up, why not get a drink after this?
^The bar’s close and you look like you need to loosen up. And you owe me a drink anyway so perfect opportunity.
